New and beautiful Arabic fonts!
We also fixed some bugs and improved performance so your Bazaart experience will be nothing short than great.

One more thing… If you love Bazaart, please rate us on the App Store! We’ll be forever thankful to you.

With love,
The Bazaart Team

We’re thrilled to bring to you this update, just in time for the launch of the exciting iOS 12!

• Bazaart now supports iOS 12 for a silky smooth experience
• Beautiful new fall themed stickers and fonts
• New Web Search! Now supports transparent image search.

One more thing… If you love Bazaart, please rate us on the App Store! We’ll be forever thankful to you.

With love,
The Bazaart Team

We’re thrilled to bring you Bazaart 6.0, a great new update to start 2019 with a bang!

So, here’s the big news:
Design templates will make your life so much easier in the new year. With hundreds of gorgeous templates to choose from, ranging from Instagram Stories to a WhatsApp Stickers, you can now create something exceptional for any need in seconds, by simply replacing a photo or text. Templates are neatly organized in categories making it easy to find what you need, when you need it, with new templates constantly added.

Wait, there’s more!
• Use Bazaart more conveniently with a brand new and beautiful app design
• Find what you need quickly and easily with templates, projects and tutorials tabs
• Remove the background from photos of people and pets in a snap, with a radically improved magic cut out tool
• Replace a photo in any template simply by tapping on the photo
• Add amazing stickers to your photos with a totally redesigned stickers tool
• Learn how to edit like a pro with new guided tutorials
• Make your Valentine’s Day card with love themed backgrounds, stickers, fonts, shape cut outs, and templates

One more thing…
If you love Bazaart, please rate us on the App Store! We’ll be forever thankful to you.

With love,
The Bazaart Team

New! Smart Eraser
Easily erase or restore the background with a brush that snaps to edges.
